_sText:
Training_Aim by Katas [ESP] An individual map for powering your aim! UPDATED TO TRAINING_AIM3, GET IT NOW!! I created this map for training my aim and I decided to show it the world :D. It has a Control panel for setting the intervals in wich targets and respawned and holded randomly in the wall. You can choose all the weapons from Counter-Strike: Source to practise with. Use this map everyday for aiming better ingame :). It is not necesary to reload weapons while shooting the targets (unlimited ammo).
Features >> You can control the respawn and holding delay of targets. >> Explanations about Control panel in the wall (decals). People with low textures setting or FPS configurations won't be able to see those explanations. >> You can choose any weapon from CS:S. >> Hits Counter that counts how much targets did you shoot. >> A beep sounds when you get to shoot at a target. >> You can control how much targets to spawn in a row before stopping (25/50/100/999). >> Different distances from the wall (levels) >> Start and Stop button in each level. >> 200 Different targets all over the wall. >> Unlimited ammo with all the weapons (Don't need to reload). >> It has a good environment to prevent headaches (xD). >> Custom textures for the buttons.
How to use: Open CS:S, create a server and select training_aim in the maps list (don't allow bots). Join a team, choose a weapon, set the delay and duration you prefer for targets and go the level you want. Then click start button and wait 2 seconds for the first target to appear, you can practise moving left and right or being stand in a position. If you liked it please Vote and Comment :)
